trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image index to and from a string.
The ImageIndexConverter class is used to convert index values of an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to and from other data types, typically <xref:System.String>.
For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an ImageIndexConverter.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
Initializes and instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter"></xref> class.
Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter>.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
Converts the specified value object to a 32-bit signed integer object.
This type converter only can convert a 32-bit signed integer object to and from a string.
The `context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
This may be `null`, so you should always check.
Also, properties on the context object may also return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to provide locale information.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
An that represents the converted value.
The conversion could not be performed.
Converts the specified object to the specified destination type.
The default implementation of this method can only convert an index value represented as an <xref:System.Int32> to a <xref:System.String>.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that provides locale information.
The object to convert, typically an index represented as an <xref:System.Int32>.
The type to convert the object to, often a <xref:System.String>.
An that represents the converted value.
The destinationType is .
The specified value could not be converted to the specified destinationType.
Returns a collection of standard index values for the image list associated with the specified format context.
Returns a collection of index values for image lists associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the `context` parameter.
If an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is not found, then the parent of the component will be searched for such a list.

Typically the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method is called to before an attempt is made to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> methods.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid index values.
If no image list is found, this collection will contain a single object with a value of -1.
Determines if the list of standard values returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list.
If the list returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is exclusive, then no other values are valid.
This is typical of an enumerated data type.
If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
As implemented in this type converter, this method always returns `false`.

Typically the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method is called to before an attempt is made to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> methods.
A formatter context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues*> method returns an exclusive list of valid values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines if the type converter supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
As implemented in this class, GetStandardValuesSupported always returns `true` since this object supports a standard set of index values for images that can be picked from a list.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter.GetStandardValues*> method returns a standard set of values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref uid="langword_csharp_none" name="none" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value is valid in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> collection.
As implemented in this class is always returns `true`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref uid="langword_csharp_none" name="none" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value is valid in the standard values collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
